attributes.action: Extradition time to count towards sentence equally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Police and Justice Act 2007 151a states   

Deduction of time spent in custody awaiting extradition

This needs amending to include the time pending extradition.   At present anybody who serves time in prison outside of the UK that time served is not counted towards their sentence if that person has already been convicted i.e. anybody convicted in absence and found in another country any time spent in prisons outside the UK is not counted

rejection.details: Your title shouold be a call for change not a statement i.e. it should start with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
